text: Conducted bi-weekly lab sessions and tutored undergraduates in software engineering and web development, covering HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Java, SQL, and more. Provided hands-on guidance in server-client programming, enhancing practical skills in web application design, implementation, testing, and debugging.

Developed a comprehensive inventory management software with robust backend (40+ APIs) and user-friendly frontend features. Built a complete HR system, enhanced the company's online presence with a React-based website, and mentored a junior developer.
Developed a dynamic blueprint of a software engineering company website using GatsbyJS that showcases the expertise and capabilities of a software engineering firm.
Completed undergraduate degree from Pulchowk Campus (Tribhuvan University) in Electronics and Communication Engineering.
